headline: Steel Dynamics Launches Lower-Embodied-Carbon Steel Products BIOEDGE™ and EDGE™
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ/GS: STLD) today announced lower-embodied-carbon steel product offerings, BIOEDGE™ and EDGE™, to support customers in achieving their greenhouse gas emissions reduction and sustainability initiatives.
